resources.string:
I am Ssara Gupta, and I am an Electronics and Communication Engineering student 
 I have knowledge in C, C++, and Java programming languages. 
With a keen interest in Flutter development, I am learning to develop seamless and user-friendly experiences for mobile applications. 
Currently immersed in the realm of Android development, 
I am driven by a relentless passion for technology and its potential to shape the future. 

My academic background has equipped me with an understanding of electronics principles. 
My dedication to mastering new skills and staying updated with the latest advancements fuels my desire to contribute meaningfully to the ever-evolving landscape of electronics and communication. 

With a basic coding foundation and a focus on Flutter and Android development, I am poised to make impactful contributions in the world of tech and electronics.
